sbt.config.chat.chatProtections.coop.des: Requires confirmation before actually sending a /coopadd request
sbt.config.chat.chatProtections.ip.desc: Warns you before sending a message containing an ip address
sbt.config.chat.partyFeatures.blockedUse: Users that are blocked from using party commands
sbt.config.chat.partyFeatures.boopInvite: Whether or not to prompt a party invite when booped by a player
sbt.config.chat.partyFeatures.cooldown.d: The cooldown in milliseconds between party commands
sbt.config.chat.partyFeatures.enabled.de: Whether or not to enable party commands
sbt.config.general.actionBarFilters.desc: Filters out certain information from the action bar
sbt.config.general.actionBarFilters.hide: Hide Ability Use in Action Bar
Hides the ability use in the action bar
Hide Defense in Action Bar
Hides the defense in the action bar
Hide Drill Fuel in Action Bar
Hides the drill fuel in the action bar
Hide Health in Action Bar
Hides the health in the action bar
Hide Mana in Action Bar
Hides the mana in the action bar
Hide Secrets in Action Bar
Hides the secrets display in the action bar
Hide Skill in Action Bar
Hides the skill exp messages in the action bar
Hide Tickers/Charges in Action Bar
Hides the tickers/charges in the action bar
Hide Rift Time in Action Bar
Hides the rift time in the action bar
Hide Location in Action Bar
Hides the location change messages in the action bar
sbt.config.general.brewingStandOverlay.d: Options for the brewing stand overlay
sbt.config.general.brewingStandOverlay.e: Enables the overlay for the brewing stand
sbt.config.general.hudTweaks.noRenderArm: Disables rendering of the armor bar
sbt.config.general.hudTweaks.showHeartsI: Only hide hearts outside of the Rift
sbt.config.general.hudTweaks.noRenderHun: Disables rendering of the hunger bar
sbt.config.general.hudTweaks.noShadowAct: Removes the shadow from the action bar
sbt.config.general.hudTweaks.noRenderPot: Disables rendering of the potion overlay in the HUD
sbt.config.general.inventory.desc: Various tweaks to the inventory screen
sbt.config.general.inventory.noRenderPot: Disables rendering of the potion HUD in your inventory
sbt.config.general.inventory.redirectRec: Redirects the recipe book button to the SkyBlock recipe book
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.desc: Settings for Menu Highlights and coloring
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.enable: Whether or not to highlight hubs in the dungeon hub selector based on their capacity
Whether or not to highlight hubs in the hub selector based on their capacity
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.hotmHi: Whether or not to highlight HOTM perks based on their status (enabled/disabled)
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.sbleve: Whether or not to highlight items in the /sblevel menu based on their completion status
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.widget: Whether or not to highlight items in the /widgets menu based on their status (enabled/disabled)
sbt.config.general.menuHighlights.unclai: Whether or not to highlight unclaimed commissions in the commissions menu
Whether or not to highlight unclaimed Jacob's Contest Rewards in his menu
sbt.config.general.notificationStream.de: What updates you want to be notified about. Alpha will notify you about all updates, Beta will notify you about beta and release updates, Release will only notify you about release updates, and None will disable notifications.

The Github user to use for the data repo
§cDon't change this unless you know what you're doing!

Whether or not to send Hypixel Mod API error messages in chat.
§cPlease note that SBT may not be the cause of these errors, as it recieves any errors the mod API gives, even if they were caused by another mod

sbt.config.mining.fetchur.chatSolver.des: Enables the Fetchur chat solver, which automatically tells you which item Fetchur is asking for when you talk to him
sbt.config.mining.fetchur.fetchurHud.des: Enables the HUD which shows the item Fetchur is currently asking for

sbt.config.mining.fetchur.scale.desc: The scale of the Fetchur HUD
sbt.config.general.reforgeOverlay.filter: Enables the Reforge Filter Overlay, which allows you to seek out certain reforges in the Blacksmith and stop yourself from accidentally reforging again when you already have the desired reforge
sbt.config.general.reforgeOverlay.nameTo: Whether to show a tooltip with the reforge name in the Blacksmith Menu. If enabled, the tooltip will show even if the filter overlay is disabled.
sbt.config.general.reforgeOverlay.filter: Whether to render the text in the Reforge Filter Overlay with a shadow
